org.apache.spark

Interface LocalSparkContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumulatorSuite, AkkaUtilsSuite, BroadcastSuite, CheckpointSuite, CoarseGrainedSchedulerBackendSuite, ContextCleanerSuite, ContextCleanerSuiteBase, DAGSchedulerSuite, DistributedSuite, FailureSuite, FileServerSuite, FileSuite, FlatmapIteratorSuite, ImplicitOrderingSuite, JdbcRDDSuite, JobCancellationSuite, JobProgressListenerSuite, MapOutputTrackerSuite, ShuffleNettySuite, ShuffleSuite, SortShuffleContextCleanerSuite, SortShuffleSuite, SparkConfSuite, SparkContextInfoSuite, SparkListenerSuite, TaskContextSuite, TaskResultGetterSuite, TaskSchedulerImplSuite, TaskSetManagerSuite, ThreadingSuite, UnpersistSuite

    public interface LocalSparkContext
    Manages a local `sc` SparkContext variable, correctly stopping it after each test.
